sentences.en: For all will be holy, and their king is the Lord Messiah.
sentences.cn: 因她的子民全是圣洁, 而主弥赛亚就是他们的王.

sentences.en: He believes in every new political messiah.
sentences.cn: 他对政治上每个新救星都深信不疑.

sentences.en: He may well have wondered: Is Jesus the Messiah?
sentences.cn: 那时他心里可能在想: 耶稣是弥赛亚 吗 ?

sentences.en: He was somehow destined to become a rock messiah.
sentences.cn: 冥冥之中，他注定会成为摇滚乐的救世主。

sentences.en: He's seen by many as a political messiah.
sentences.cn: 许多人将他视为政治救星。

sentences.en: Jakob Heym may not be the messiah, but he could be a prophet.
sentences.cn: 杰克卜·海姆可能不是救世主, 但他可以做个预言家.

sentences.en: Like a lamb came the Messiah, Christ the King.
sentences.cn: 就像一只羔羊一样,这位弥赛亚, 基督君王走了过来.

sentences.en: People saw Mandela as their messiah.
sentences.cn: 人民把曼德拉视为他们的救星。

sentences.en: Shanghai Messiah is the service unit for the exhibition company.
sentences.cn: 上海赛亚是以服务为单位的展览公司.

sentences.en: Surely, I thought, the Messiah himself - if he should ever come - won't niggle over nickels and dimes.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问, 我想即使弥赛本人出面,他也不会如此铁面无私.

sentences.en: This is the story of the birth of the Messiah.
sentences.cn: 现在讲的是耶稣基督的降生.

sentences.en: Two thousand and four years ago, Messiah was born in Bethlehem.
sentences.cn: 二千零四年前, 弥赛亚出生在伯利恒.

sentences.en: What makes this man different than any man who claims to be the Messiah?
sentences.cn: 到底是什么让这个声称自己是弥赛亚的人如此不同?

sentences.en: What of your dire warnings? And this Demon Messiah?
sentences.cn: 你那可怕的预言是 什么 ?是这个魔鬼弥赛亚 吗 ?

sentences.en: What's your friend's problem, Napoleon or messiah complex?
sentences.cn: 你朋友有什么问题?以为自己是救世主 吗 ?

sentences.en: With the coming of Messiah, there would be fiery and severe judgment.
sentences.cn: 随著弥撒亚的到来, 将伴有烈火和审判.

words.tran_cn: 弥赛亚（犹太人所期待的救世主）；救星，解放者

trans.tran_cn: （犹太人盼望的复国救主）弥赛亚，救世主耶稣，(m-)救星，解放者
trans.tran_en: For Jews, the Messiah is the king of the Jews, who will be sent to them by God
